name: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6 DX
description: Switch port of Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6 and Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6: Gentou Rondo with sixteen new stills, new events, and a new fully voiced prologue.

name: Mars Underground
description: Mars Underground is an apocalyptic adventure where you relive the same day over and over. With each cycle new items can be picked up and topics unlocked.​ Explore the possibilities of this timeloop and uncover multiple endings.

name: Kenka Banchou Otome 2nd Rumble!!
description: The sequel of the original game of Kenka Bancho Otome. It adds a new Character at Shishiku Academy.

name: LoveR
description:
Romance... Record.
A new love is starting.
Summer in senior high school.
An encounter with 6 girls... and love happens.

name: Weekend Drive
description:
Welcome to Weekend Drive, a game that's just about fun and nothing else!
Have a relaxing drive in Weekend City, where there might be an alien invasion, a giant zombie, or even rampaging dinosaurs, or whatever I come up with. Have fun surviving the calamities and unlocking weapons and vehicles.

name: Guardians of the Past
description: Guardians of the Past is a fast-paced arena brawler where you use gadgets to battle with or against your friends in a variety of arenas constructed by YOU! Build an array of launch-pads, fields of electrical chaos or even a sea of fire. With hundreds of combinations, every game is unique!

name: One Piece: World Seeker
description: Set sail on an all-new ONE PIECE adventure in ONE PIECE World Seeker! Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates are back in a new story that puts players’ into Luffy’s point of view, as he battles and explores an expansive and seamless world. Open landscapes provide many paths for players to experience Luffy’s gum-gum abilities and swing into action.

name: Wall Street Tycoon
description: A stock market simulation.

name: Twinsanity: Trapped in Time
description: Twinsanity: Trapped in Time is an RPG game which is based on the series "Twinsanity The Animated Series". Prepare to race against time with the evil mastermind Time Shadow. He trapped Twinsanity in another timeline and your job is to return him home. Are you ready to help him?

name: Kowareta Sekai wo Kimi to Iku
description:
In a desolate world, there were two men.
There was a man with curly orange hair and a man wearing a cloak.
The orange-haired man rolled his eyes. As if he had seen something unbelievable, as if he had seen a ghost, he was very surprised. But soon his expression changes to one of joy. His lips curled into a smile, and he ran closer to the cloaked man.

A apocalyptic sci-fi BL visual novel about two men who met in a broken world.

name: CardioEX
description:
You work hard, now it’s time to play hard in the cardiology app that reimagines your specialty as a captivating video game. A winning combination of clinical and procedural gameplay brings you back to what you love about practicing medicine and delivers critical information that keeps you performing at the top of your game.
Cases refresh daily: Diagnose and treat diseases from common to rare, and play even more heart-pumping PCI levels within Cardio Ex's vivid vasculature. Rare medical scenarios and complications help you stay a beat ahead and prepare for your next real-life boss level.

name: New Super Kaizo Bros.
description:
An intermediate-level Kaizo hack of Super Mario World, starring 24 exits.

New Super Kaizo Bros features:
- custom musics
- retry system
- wall kick

name: Tennis Pong!
description: This is not your average easy ping pong game. This is Tennis Pong!

name: Cave Story MD
description: This is a rewrite/port of the popular freeware game Cave Story for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

name: Streamers Company Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Codex
description: Battle against an evil force in this unique word/RPG hybrid game! Face off against countless enemies in turn-based combat by mastering words, spells, weapons, and items. Explore an ever-unfolding map with characters to meet, stories to tell, and quests to embark upon. Earn gold and visit shops to upgrade your equipment and buy items. Earn experience to level up and improve your character's fighting stats in combat.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: C&O Hinton Division
description: Hinton Division, one of the major coal producing areas for the C&O, starting just west of Thurmond, WV through to Hinton, WV and also includes the Laurel Creek Sub Division, and parts of the Piney Creek Sub, Rend Sub and Loup Creek Sub.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ECML Kings Cross - Edinburgh 1976
description: This route covers the full route from London Kings Cross Station all the way to Edinburgh in Scotland - a 393 mile drive! With significant updates to almost every feature along the track, the route will take you back in time to 1976 UK.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Healesville 1910's
description: This layout covers the last 19 miles of the Healesville line from Mooroolbark to Healesville, set in approximately 1913-1920, prior to the line to Lilydale being electrified, and during the period when the locomotives were painted Canadian Red.

name: Pixelot
description: Pixelot is a classic RPG that combines the best parts of old school role-playing games. In Pixelot you create a custom hero and gather allies to defend against the darkness that has swept over the land of Pixelot. The game features numerous recruitable characters, playable classes, items, monsters, and dungeons alike. Promising an engaging story line, humorous dialogue, and a classic yet simple design, Pixelot is a game that is easy to pick up and hard to put down.

name: Nice Bowling
description: Nice Bowling is an unfair bowling game modeled after the late 80's, early 90's obsession with chrome and neon, Nice Bowling's unique look and retrowave/chillwave soundtrack will really bring you back. Random events can trigger on any frame of play to a huge variety of outcomes- good luck bowling with a beach ball, a jelly blob, or a bouncy ball. Sometimes fish rain from the sky and block the lane. Sometimes there will be obstacles or ramps in your path.

name: Kart kids
description: A chaotic racing game in which up to 60 tiny karts race each other in the hood.

name: Heroes of Hammerwatch: Pyramid of Prophecy
description:
Pyramid of Prophecy, the first expansion to Heroes of Hammerwatch, lets you explore and experience several completely new areas in the world of Hammerwatch - far out in the desert, deep down the pyramid itself, or take your best hero to the arena and see how long you can last!

Tons of new enemies, traps and puzzles, gameplay mechanics, items, environments, music and much more!

Features:
- A brand new campaign with 3 new acts and bosses.
- The new Gladiator class.
- New upgrades for the town and characters.
- Several new items, enemies and mechanics.
- A new survival arena game mode.

name: Gunkid 99
description: Gunkid 99 is a fast and frantic 2D arena-shooter that will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes. Craft your own unique play-style and develop crazy combos​ with numerous weapons and abilities at your disposal! Lay waste to endless hordes of enemies and get that top score on the Global Leaderboards!

name: Stacks TNT
description: Stacks TNT is a block-based sandbox game where each block follows the laws of Jelly-physics! You play Chuck, a guy stranded in a desolate world, with only a jet pack and a pair of hands to work with. To get back home, you need to EXPLORE the terrain for resources. BUILD factories to convert resources to useful items, like guns, bombs and rocket engines. DEFEND your flag against waves of MobCorp agents by building fortresses and laying out traps. CONQUER the world by constructing towers, bridges, rocket propelled ships and anything else you can imagine within in a fully dynamic world. FIND a mysterious hidden relic. And finally, build the Ark space ship and bring yourself home!

name: Genesis
description: Genesis is a controller exclusive next generation online-competitive MOBA. Utilizing Unreal 4 Engine, it boasts stunning graphics and smooth control. Genesis differentiates from classic MOBA games by opting for joystick control which is highly optimized （Mouse and keyboard control is not supported）.

name: Let's Learn Japanese! Katakana
description: Want to read Japanese? Let's learn Katakana! A game teaching the Japanese alphabet through puzzles and arcade-style challenges.

name: Tankorama
description: Tankorama is an old school top-down shoot 'em up game with modern graphics and addictive gameplay. Control hovering tanks, destroy enemies, collect power ups and challenge wicked bosses in single player. Show who is the boss on Earth!

name: Junkyard Wizard
description: You find yourself stuck in a sinkhole in the middle of some backwoods junkyard and things are far from normal. Everything in this hole has telekinetic abilities. Including you. Use your new found powers to defend yourself and fight back against wave after wave of toasters, vacuums, televisions, and more.

name: Running Ninja
description: Run! Jump! Dodge! In this platformer you will need your reaction speed and clarity of mind. Сhallenge the deadly tower and prove that you are worthy of the title of ninja.

name: Poggers
description: Take control of Bun-Bun Poggers the adorable bunny rabbit in this classic retro arcade game where the goal is to cross a dangerous field of cobras and a then cross a wide river by jumping on floating logs to get him home!

name: FanaticBlader
description: An easy and fast 3D Side-Scroll action game, "Fanatic Blader" Challenge the "Cursed Tower" that any wish will come true!

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Una aventura de cine - Edición especial
description: The return of the adventures "Two sloppy cowboys" and "Terror, horror and fear" in a special edition that is the best and most modern work of the Spanish studio Alcachofa Soft in the franchise.

name: Crash Landed
description: Welcome to Crash Landed! The greatest adventure made by one guy! Your space ship has crashed...Your love is lost...It's time for you to step up! Guide your hero on a dangerous 16-bit style journey on a foreign planet. Travel across 20 heart pounding stages to find your lost love.

name: Space Adventure TD
description: A Tower Defense game made in the best tradition with 35 unique towers, 70 upgrades and 8 biomes. A 20 level campaign and 2 challenge levels for now, with more to come! Made by an indie developper.

name: Ragtag
description: RagTag is a unique blend of action and strategy that puts you in control of a RagTag group of humans, mutants, animals and cyborgs as you fight from extinction across the stars. RagTag has simple mechanics that allow complex manoeuvres and trick shots to dispatch your enemy.

name: Melee
description: A tactical competitive shooting game devoloped with a self developed engine, melee is a game where you can feel its difference, and if you want to feel disaster and escape in flight, it's a thrilling adventure.

name: Endless Maneuver
description: Cool and addictive game in which you can compete with other players on two difficulty levels.

name: It's a Trap
description: Can you survive the deadly traps in unexplored catacombs? Reclaim the legendary Crystal of Truth before the Nazis and you will see the world differently. Test your wisdom, courage and moves in a real challenge. Only for HTC Vive.

name: The Gameshow
description: The Gameshow is an FPS game where you participate in a dangerous survival game. This is not your game. You, together with other players, have been kidnapped and brought to a forest, with an unknown creature living there. Now, surviving is your only objective.

name: TrivaTune
description: TrivaTune is a Quiz game where you make the quizes or use public made ones and play with your friends in fun retro envrioments. Each enviroment will have little easter eggs and minigames for you and your friends to play.

name: Chess 3D Ultimate
description: Chess Game Free is the best free Chess game, best casual games on Android with friendly user interface, smart AI, pretty visual effect. With 3D model of chess for King, Queen, Bishop, Knight, Rook and Pawn, both black and white piece, rotation effect, you will enter the 3D world of chess.

name: Prison Escape
description: It has been far too long since the last time the inmate has been outside of the prison walls. Now that he has a chance to escape and live a free life... What will happen when he gets to return home.

name: Super Dangerous Trap
description: Run and jump past traps and enemies. Avoid various obstacles, as platforms, holes and other leathal hazards.

name: Try to Fall Asleep
description: John Herrin survived a horrible accident, damaging his brain and memory. Through falling asleep, he can rediscover his unfortunate past in his dreams, but because of his brain damage he'll start to see visions and hallucinations, and falling asleep won't be as easy as it seems at first...

name: Baba is You
description: Baba Is You is a puzzle game where you can change the rules by which you play. In every level, the rules themselves are present as blocks you can interact with; by manipulating them, you can change how the level works and cause surprising, unexpected interactions! With some simple block-pushing you can turn yourself into a rock, turn patches of grass into dangerously hot obstacles, and even change the goal you need to reach to something entirely different.

name: Bifrost Spire
description:
Bifrost Spire is a Twin-Stick Shooter Bullet-Hell where you play as a Viking seeking to climb the Spire and become a God of Valhalla.

Play with up to four players in different game modes, working together and competing against each other for power and wealth. Use dozens of weapons and abilities to unleash mayhem on your enemies (and friends) while exploring procedurally generated dungeons, where risk means reward.

name: Tales of Blood and Sand
description: Tales of Blood and Sand is an RPG set in the time of Roman Republic. Join Cassius and his brothers in their struggle to achieve glory and freedom. Enter the arena and see if you can survive to tell the tale.

name: Haitoku Shirene: Anata no Shiranai Naraku no Soko
description:
You must not set foot in this story with a pure and loving heart.
When you pursue the forbidden secret of the girl, you will be struck down to the depths of hell...

name: Block Puzzle
description: Drop the blocks to create vertically or horizontally lines of blocks without gaps. When such a line is created, it gets destroyed. Keep your board clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this simple but addictive puzzle game!

name: Fat Prisoner Simulator
description: Fat Prisoner Simulator - a soccer simulator where you play the role of a prisoner. The jail managers have noticed that some prisoners, who really like to eat a lot, can hardly go through the doors, including those of their cells.

name: The Crawl
description: The Crawl is a dungeon crawling platformer in which you have to find a path that allows you to discover enough keys to make it to the exit.

name: The Caligula Effect: Overdose - Swimsuit Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Hina-chan Snowtime
description: A doujin game by ISY based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Trail Mix
description: Cooperate with a friend, foe, or lover to solve mind bending puzzles!

name: The Lord of The Rings ACG: The Shadow's Fall Expansion
description: The Shadow's Fall is the first expansion for Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game. Coming with 4 new Heroes packs and continuing the Shadow's Reach storyline. Dive further into Bilbo's journey !

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Year 1 Pass
description:
The Year 1 Pass has expired as of 1 March 2020. There are now Season Passes for each Season of The Division 2.

Owners of the Year 1 Pass will get access to:
• Three additional specialisations, unlocked instantly.
Unique customisation options will be made available as part of the new specialisations.
• Eight classified assignments.
Unique backpack trophies will be awarded for completing the assignments.
• Agent Ward outfit.
Please note that the outfit will not be listed under Uniforms. Items will be available individually from their respective sections: boots, pants, scarf and shirt.
• Scout emote.

The Year 1 Pass is available as part of the:
• Gold Edition.
• Warlords of New York Ultimate Edition.
• Year 1 Bundle

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces
description: Many convenient functions for completing the puzzle, such as the function to separate edge and inner pieces and the auto save function for playing lighthearted at any time. - a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Dog and an American Shorthair Cat - Saint Isaac's Cathedral - The Dolomites in Italy Play with the above three different pictures that have three different piece sizes: large, medium, and small. And a lot of DLC is releasing, such as beautiful landscape of the world, masterpieces of painting, popular cartoon characters, dogs and cats. You will surely find the your best puzzle! If it is a digital jigsaw puzzle... You don't have to worry about losing the pieces. You don't have to need prepare a large space to suspend the puzzle. Let's have fun playing the jigsaw puzzle with "Jigsaw Masterpieces"! Features: -Easy-to-play traditional jigsaw puzzle -Selection of six background colors -For each jigsaw puzzle, 3 difficulty levels can be set -Separate edge and inner pieces -Ability to snap individual pieces together -Auto save -More puzzles will increase with DLC

name: Doc Cosmos
description: Sin descripción

name: Power & Revolution: 2019 Edition
description: The new evolution of Geopolitical Simulator 4, the hyperrealistic simulator of today's world! In Power & Revolution 2019 Edition, play as the Head of State and extend your influence around the globe. By playing as several countries, try to change the destiny of our planet with orchestrated actions.

name: Lofi Ping Pong
description: Meditative rhythm ping-pong

name: Bomber Crew: American Edition
description:
Prepare your crew for their most dangerous mission yet and go chocks away for a sky-bound expedition in this strategic survival sim, Bomber Crew: American Edition. Choose your crew; fit with procedurally generated names, skills and back stories, and jump in the cockpit of this immersive flight simulator where death is permanent and the odds are stacked against you! 
 
Included in the Bomber Crew: American Edition is the USAAF DLC, featuring the iconic American Bomber! Pilot more crew members, engage in a new theatre of war, and fight new deadly foes from the air and seas in this all new content.

name: Zero Deaths
description: A post-apocalyptic action-adventure about Felix's resurrection from the ashes of the Sub-Bot War of 2019.

name: Little Shopping
description: Play and learn how to count - simple game for toddlers and preschoolers! This is a simple counting game for children. Learning to count has never been so easy and fun!

name: Note: A Composer and a Note
description: "I'VE DONE SOMETHING WONDERFUL" _ PLAY Mephistowaltz NOTE : a composer and a note is an indie minimalist 2d platformer for every artist in the world. Player is both a composer and a note. This is the journey for composition with a unique mechanic. Player plays like playing the piano. It offers a thrill, fresh and meaning.

name: BombFall
description: You play as a bomb that traverse three stages of Earth's atmosphere freely moving within the flight corridor towards the target cityscape, bashing various enemies with your super tough nose, gaining powerups, and "collecting" clouds to charge your retro thrusters.

name: Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Free Edition
description:
Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Free Edition is packed with iconic stages and music from the entire Final Fantasy series, a cast of over 25 beloved characters with unique fighting styles and abilities, legendary summons that wreak destruction on the arena and much more.

Available for play in both online and offline gameplay modes, players of both Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Free Edition and the full Dissidia Final Fantasy NT game can challenge each other in exhilarating fights with a weekly rotation of four unique characters from the huge roster available.

name: Robot Female Hero 1
description: What if you combined the weird logic and stories of anime and every single RPG ever, and smartass American internet humor and reasoning? Well you get this old sport!

name: Outlaws of the Old West
description: Outlaws of the Old West is a massively multiplayer survival MMO with a huge world, thousands of items and a modular building system. Survive the wild, build your own homestead, defeat villainous bandits and work with others to tame the Wild West.

name: MX vs. ATV: All Out - Anniversary Edition
description:
What’s new in the Anniversary Edition?

Ricky Carmichael Farm – GOAT: Two Supercross, one Nationals, one Waypoint, and 2 Opencross tracks PLUS multiple trails in Freeride!

Slash’s Snake Pit: Three of the largest Supercross tracks in MX vs ATV history PLUS and FMX area!

Hometown MX Nationals: The most authentic outdoors tracks! Four, huge Nationals tracks and 2 Freeride environments to explore with different time of day variations.

name: Exocraft
description: Design unique spaceships and build the ultimate space mining fleet as you team up to battle for resources and glory in this massively multiplayer action strategy set in an alien wasteland.

name: LEGO Marvel Collection
description: The LEGO Marvel Collection features three action-packed LEGO Marvel games: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes, LEGO Marvel's Avengers, and LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2, plus all season pass content for each game.

name: Redviil
description: Now it's 2143, my name is Alice, I was born in a small town called Gwaine. I dream to continue the work of my great-grandfather: to find a cure for the red plague and release people living in hundreds of bunkers.

name: Super Chains
description: Experience the all-new challenges designed to perplex, delight and unwind the mind. Super Chains combines a variety of puzzles that everybody can enjoy.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Gold Edition
description:
The Gold Edition contains:

3-Day Early Access.
Private Beta Access.
Year 1 Pass.
Digital bonus content.

name: Victory Project
description:
Ramon, a disgraced former entrepreneur, is assigned to work at a military-run orphanage on the mysterious “Hive Island” in exchange for early release from prison. After his arrival, he learns that the island is a facility for conducting secret medical experiments, and quickly falls in love with Durian, one of the young test subjects.

The two of them plan their escape together, but freedom may not be so easy to attain. What is the truth behind the experiments, what effect have they had on the inhabitants of the island, and what will Ramon and Durian be willing to sacrifice for their victory…?

name: Fur Fury
description: Raccoon Mike is going to celebrate his birthday, but he has nothing to treat to friends. Loyal friends decide to help him collect treats in house with not very hospitable owners.

name: Hypnospace Outlaw
description: Hypnospace Outlaw is a '90s internet simulator in which players act as Enforcers, volunteer moderators who scour Hypnospace's surreal network of weird and wonderful websites to hunt down wrongdoers while also keeping an eye on their inbox, avoiding viruses and adware, and downloading a plethora of apps that may or may not be useful.

name: Trancelation
description: Trancelation is an addictive PC game which proves that dynamic gameplay, neon lights, and electronic music go well with translating words. Dive into a trance, test and develop your skills, beat your own scores – become the master of Trancelation!

name: Trüberbrook
description: Enjoy an adventurous vacation to a 1960's parallel universe! A Sci-Fi-Mystery Adventure Game with handmade scenery.

name: Rico
description:
Rico is an arcade-style, first-person shooter inspired by modern action cinema. In the game you and a friend play as a pair of loose-cannon police partners, given twenty-four hours to crack a case as part of an elite organised crime taskforce.

Planning is tactical rather than strategic, players must react in the moment to shootouts as they unfurl, with additional extra time to assess the situation if they are able to surprise their adversaries. Ammo and enemies are plentiful, and combat is punchy and impactful, supported by an extensive destruction system that ensures every shot looks and feels great.

name: Guardian Girls: Astral Battle
description:
The world is attacked by monsters called Astral Spirits. Play as Necta, Mikan, Mao, and Ghina and defend the earth by shooting all the Astral Spirits. Help the girls battle all the astral spirits.

Guardian Girls: Astral Battle is a simple shmup game with a lot of bullets (bullet hell). Player have to dodge the incoming bullets and enemies while shooting and destroy the enemies. You don’t need internet and you can play this game offline.

name: Hollo Ball
description:
Hollo Ball will keep you hooked for hours!
One finger control. Easy to play, hard to master.
Features unlimited gameplay.
Build your newest addiction!

name: Gray
description: This story is about a man that somehow wakes in the body of a little robot. Gray is a platform-puzzle game combined with an erotic visual novel.

name: Saltwater Shells
description: Play as Loke, a small kid from a small island helping your mom collect shells for the decorations in the upcoming town festival. Collect shells, a pogo stick, and other items to help you get as many shells as you can! Explore the island and talk to everyone, they'll help you reach that perfect score!

name: Hedon Bloodrite
description: Immerse yourself in a crystalpunk underworld where the visceral combat of the 90s' FPS games blends with the exploration and puzzle solving of classic dungeon crawlers and adventure games.

name: The ever-changing case of the unpaid rent
description: Detective roguelike where you solve mysteries and try to pay rent

name: Tides of Time: The Board Game
description:
Tides of Time is a card drafting game for two players that takes place over three rounds.
On your turn, choose one card from your hand, then pass your hand to your opponent. Each card is one of five suits and a scoring objective. Once all cards have been taken, players calculate their scores based on the cards drafted.
Between rounds, you will choose one card to keep for future rounds, and one card to remove from the game. After three rounds the player with the most points wins!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: USA
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Monsters with Attitude
description: Monsters with Attitude is an online PvP game with monsters. A new take on IO games that features unique powers and abilities to all monsters.

name: Golf Defied
description: Golf Defied is a new trend in the sphere already established for many ideas, both about Golf and video games. We have tried to realize as much possibilities as possible on the base of Golf concept. We hope that after trying the game, you will most of your requirements.

name: Dark Forest Virtual Chatroom
description: Explore an abandoned virtual chatroom. Befriend the bots who live there. End a world.

name: Amanda's Sticker Book 2: Amazing Wldlife
description: After winning her first sticker book competition, Amanda has her eyes set on even greater heights. Help Amanda create award-winning sticker books. Swap stickers, earn power-ups and clear each puzzle to make Amanda's new dream come true.

name: Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning
description: "Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning" is the last part of the thrilling "Greed" triology! Dr. Goodwin's miracle cure is once again under threat and Sara has contacted you for help. Old enemies are up to new tricks at Pontoon Laboratories and this time they are willing to kill to get their hands on the cure.

name: Groomer
description: Groomer is a relaxing simulation game where take on a role of groomer, a person that takes care of dogs.

name: Figure Quest
description: You're a figure. Lots of obstacles stand in your way and you need to escape. Don't get hit and maybe you'll escape.

name: Drunkard Quiz Show Hyoutan
description: It is a game of quiz program format. You choose one of four challengers to capture four genres. Each genre has a partner who comes out with a quiz, and if defeated by that partner, the challenger will be made into alcohol.

name: Lyratha: Labyrinth - Survival Escape
description: Far away from the fate of the world and time, deep in catacombs and vaults of long-forgotten places, the Lyratha Order conceals his existence, without knowledge of humanity outside.

name: Pirate Cannons Ahoy!
description: Ahoy mateys! Take charge of your fort defenses as hostile pirates invade to steal your treasure! Defend your treasure chests in this classic cannon-shooting take in this casual tower-defense game.

name: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich
description: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich is a 2D action platforming game! Become a Cyborg Ninja and destroy the Nazi menace in this throwback to the 16 bit side scrolling glory days!

name: Pursuer
description: You are a pursuer, and your job is to catch a criminal who has more than 20 victims.

name: The Far Kingdoms: Awakening Solitaire
description: In this addictive solitaire game the Princess of the Kingdom, your sister has fallen in a deep sleep for days and no one has been able to wake her! It's now clear that this is the work of an evil spell. Find the Elixir of Awakening to save her. The journey will be long and dangerous, but it's your sister's only hope.

name: Sacred Grove Solitaire
description: In a magical land far away, there is a beautiful island inhabited by elves. A sacred grove has granted these elves powerful magic but one day everything changed. A powerful earthquake has destroyed the island along with the sacred grove. The Elven Queen seeks your help to restore the island.

name: Cyborg Invasion Shooter 3: Savior of the World
description: Cyborg Trilogy last part. Cyborg has got new human transform. Kill different enemies, run and try to find teleport to other levels and save the world.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition of Tom Clancy's The Division 2 includes:

The Year 1 Pass.
A 3-days early access to the game.

Also get bonus digital content:

The Battleworn Secret Service Pack including the Secret service outfit, a rare quality emote, and exotic quality M4A1 Skin.
The First Responder Pack, including a special outfit and weapon skin.
The Elite Agent Pack, including an exotic Assault Rifle, an exclusive skill effect, and additional stash space.

name: MMA Team Manager
description: MMA team manager is the all new, face punching, body slamming manager game for the real MMA fans. Experience the life as a manager running your own team and leading the fighters to international glory in the cage.

name: Velocity G
description:
Velocity G is a futuristic Zero G, 360 degree tunnel racing game set in the year 2086.

Experience incredible high speed action as you race your way across exiting tracks, each with their own unique characteristics.

Play single player against AI, split-screen with up to 4 players, or offline versus ghost players from all over the world!

name: Skautfold: Into the Fray
description: Into the Fray is a fast action-shooter in the vein of Doom and Dark Messiah; using fast combat, reactive environments, and traps. Blast, kick, and dash your way through Rebels and Eldritch creatures to liberate the Isle of Portland; as it becomes consumed by Fog and the horrors therein.

name: RpgEra
description: Rpgera is a free adventure, survival, leisure type RPG game. Combined with a lot of fun play. There is a family does not belong to the Earth, 17 years later, the sibling will return to the impending disaster of the people, and this time what kind of story?

name: Happy Empire - The Marriage Voyage
description: Meet good and evil heroes and progress through the Empire by using their help. Let the honeymoon end happily! Defeat the Evil Wizard and return home victorious!

name: Don't Escape: 4 Days to Survive
description: After scraping out a bleak existence in the post-apocalyptic wastelands, you thought you were prepared for anything. But now there’s no way to run. The choices you make determine how everything plays out in this classic point-and-click adventure.

name: Mario and the Magic Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Adonis: Escape from Urania
description: 17-map Boom megawad, sequel of Urania. After defeating the tyrant monster from Urania, your spaceship was hit by unknown forces and you had to catapult back to the surface of Urania, in the industrial area, between the jungle and the mountains. Earth coalition ships are under fire and cannot help you. Received information from the command center: this time the threat comes from the moon of Urania - Adonis. The task is to find a way to get to Adonis and destroy the enemies there.

name: Dungeon Girl Scouts
description:
Play as two Dungeon Girl Scouts as they try their best to sell cookies to monsters! Venture forth into a dungeon, make new friends, and solve a mystery.

I mean, what could go wrong when you are all prepared?

name: Wait For It
description: A roguelike where the wait key holds the most power.

name: Vampire Garden
description:
Be wary of the sun; the light that gives your plants life will take yours away.
Grow your garden across 83 levels.

name: Teocalli
description: Traverse 13 levels of the temple to find the lost treasure!

name: Furry Chronicles
description: Furry Chronicles is a classic sidescrolling platformer game with challenging levels and puzzles.

name: Ultimate Coaster X
description: Ultimate Coaster X is a free roller coaster simulator built with simplicity and utility in mind. The in-game roller coaster and world editors allow you to create and experience rides of many types.

name: Deicide
description: Deicide is a sci fi/fantasy themed 3rd person team arena brawler featuring fast paced gameplay and unorthodox character designs. Grab two of your friends and play in 3 versus 3 last humanoid standing arena.

name: El Taco Diablo
description: El Taco Diablo is a hardcore standstill arena shooter, with your trusty revolver and shotgun, defeat endless waves of UFOs and weaponized tacos. Earn your place as the #1 gunslinger with the most accurate and fastest aim ever seen.

name: Forward: Escape the Fold
description: Forward: Escape the Fold is a bitesized roguelike in which your hero crawls through a series of card-based dungeons. Choose your champion and face a relentless crawl through the card-based dungeons, collect items to power your abilities and defeat the gruesome monsters facing you. It won't be easy, but you must keep going forward!

name: Dark Romance: Hunchback of Notre-Dame - Collector's Edition
description: Can you save the city from the dangerous criminal Quasimodo?

name: Auf Abwegen
description: Explore the beauty and dangers of nature in this narrative mini-puzzle-platformer - a one-man project from Kindman. Slip into the role of a red fox in its natural habitat - feed your family and survive the threats of the forest - and humans too!

name: Froggo
description: Nice minimal casual game about Froggy & Co.

name: Minskies
description: Minskies Furballs is not a port, but a spiritual clone of Puyo Puyo. In a tournament against a cast of crazy characters, you must guide and rotating falling pairs of cats of different colours to make up colour combinations.

name: Next Stop 3
description: Margaret needs your help once again! You must repair the railway over 50 levels, build a sorting center and win in a billion-dollar escapade!

name: EscapeRoute
description: The robots are in control , things are so tight you think you can’t even breath without letting them know. You decide to not be part of this and then it happens …..

name: Stayer
description: Anonymous letter: the loss of heart is the beginning of the series of anonymous letter puzzle game, mainly tells about the intern detective man because of receiving an anonymous letter and broke the original quiet, when the letter instructions came to the abandoned 13 high school, found that everything has changed, is the trap?

name: TetrotronVR
description: Nothing can be better than well overlooked old, but in new format! TetrotronVR is completely new look at the usual. Being on the surface of Mars and have limited time you will need to fill the gaps in the wall, with the help of familiar figures in the form of square, line, letters "L" and "Z".

name: Torn Earth
description: Welcome to Torn Earth. An open world post apocalyptic adventure where choices matter and survival is key.

name: Haunting Hour
description: Cooperate in this Multiplayer Virtual Reality Escape Room to escape the Witch’s Castle. Pit your wits against twisted puzzles and crazy challenges as you and your fellow imprisoned ghosts race against time. There's only an hour until the Haunting Hour begins, will you make it out?

name: Minion Masters: Voidborne Onslaught
description:
Voidborne Onslaught is the Faction Box for starting your Voidborne Army – or adding some reinforcements to your existing Voidborne collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Voidborne Minions, including the massive Legendary Colossus as well as 2 exclusive Voidborne cosmetics.

Includes:
- 3x Colossus (Legendary)
- 5x Succubus (Supreme)
- 20x Rammer
- 40x Nether Bat
- 40x Morgrul's Ragers
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Avatar - Animated Colossus!
- 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Emote - Animated Doompuffer!

The Voidborne faction is aggressive with high speed and dark magic. With this Faction Box, you can immediately experiment with the "Voidborne Wound" mechanic using "Morgrul’s Ragers" which makes your minions stronger if any of your Voidborne Minions wounded the opponent.

name: Rosa's Garden
description:
A calm gardening game.

Rosas Garden is a calm and poetic flower game about gardening with roses. Dig little holes in the ground, find seeds, plant them and watch how slowly a rose grows. By combining fully blossomed roses, you can breed new seeds. There are over 40 combinations available and each rose is named after a famous women, paying a small tribute to their lives and achievements.

name: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops
description: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops is a Call of Duty 4 custom single player mod heavily inspired by the spec-ops mode from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. The mod provides a good collection of short spec-ops levels full of fun objectives and cool mission concepts. The levels are based on custom levels found in the mod Rooftops.

name: Quickie World 2
description: Sin descripción

name: My Billionaire Girlfriend
description: You’re caught after a desperate attempt to steal some cash and find yourself sentenced to… being a beautiful billionaire’s personal butler?

name: Femdom Waifu
description: Femdom Waifu is a JOI (Jerk Off Instruction) game where the player is controlled by cruel dominatrix.

name: Shadow Corridor
description: Now on Steam, revamped with brand new content! Immerse yourself in the latest chapter of the popular, Japanese indie horror title, Kageroh: Shadow Corridor. Survive against the onslaught of horrors that lie in wait in eerie, traditional Japanese locales that change with every playthrough.

name: Shadow Corridor
description: Chased by the spirits of the cursed Noh mask, you must do everything you can to escape. Set in traditional Japanese locales, Shadow Corridor provides a unique survival horror experience. Randomly generated maps filled with a variety of items make every playthrough different. Immerse yourself in the darkness, for only the determined will survive.

name: Harry Potter RPG
description:
Harry Potter fan-game.

Create your own Hogwarts student (House, blood status, look...) and go for a year of magical study in the school of witchcrat and Wizardry !

Will you choose to help the Order of the Phoenix, or will you join the Death-eaters? The choice is yours.

You will have to accomplish missions for them, and explore the wizard world to increase your skills.

Will you pass your exams? What will you become at the end? It's all up to you!

Inspired by the "Harry Potter" saga by J.K. Rowling. Some liberties have been taken for the needs of the game compared to the original text.

name: The Dark
description: Trust your ears. Along with your wits they're all you have as you make your way through the labyrinth to defeat the evil that lurks within.

name: Träumerei: Chapter 1
description:
Träumerei is an original Horror RPG game created in VX Ace. The game is focused on exploration, story, and characters. It contains original art, graphics, and sprites.

This game requires you to install the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play! It is also not necessary to have played Chapter 0 before this as the demo is non-canon.

name: Slapshot
description: Slapshot is an online multiplayer game where you and 5 other players play a game of hockey. The game is physics-based, so teamwork and crisp passing are essential to win. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

name: Fantastic Fetus
description: Fantastic Fetus is a pregnancy simulator, where you are taking care of a pregnant woman and create your dream fetus. The game is inspired by the Black Protest movement in Poland.

name: The Wizards: Enhanced Edition
description: Become a powerful Wizard and take fate into your own hands! Immerse yourself in a beautiful fantasy world and destroy your enemies by casting spells with hand gestures!

name: Flying Guy
description: It's an addictive game of touching and moving two controllers at the bottom with both hands to avoid blocks.

name: Proficient Paddles Deluxe
description: Proficient Paddles: Deluxe is a super fast-paced arcade game. One or two players? It's your choice! Battle a friend locally with each Joy-Con™ controller or go against an AI with three selectable difficulties. Will you show your patriotism by outfitting your country's paddle, or embrace your inner showman by flaunting one of the many eye-catching colored paddles? The choice is yours! In this fast-paced sports action title, you make your own battles...

name: Paperbound Brawlers
description: Be a gravity ninja. Between one and four players run with scissors, walk on walls, and lob ink bombs in whimsical-yet-intense battles within the pages of old storybooks.

name: The Path to Die
description: Travel to Feudal Japan and use your right stick as your katana to slay your enemies in this action and adventure game represented in pixel art and top down view.

name: Mage VR: The Lost Memories
description: Maybe you don't remember, but some of us do remember that we are Mages. Try a gesture, see if it starts fire in your hands, maybe you are one of us. Use this power and please save the world from this new malediction.

name: A way up!
description: A way up! is a simple platformer about throwing a rock. WARNING - you may find it really hard.

name: Rogue Star Rescue
description: Bullet Hell Insanity + Tower Defense Strategy. Rogue Star Rescue is a quirky new type of rogue-like shooter. Blast your way through diverse planets while rescuing your teammates and gathering traps for your defense strategy.

name: Winter Solitaire
description: In this magical Solitaire game you must defeat the Ice Queen before the land is sealed in eternal winter!

name: 5.84 Wing
description: 5.84 Wing - Minimalist action-adventure game, with many levels for which you have to overcome a lot of obstacles to collect keys and open doors.

name: DooM in the Dark
description: The space station has undergone an unknown contamination from space, the previously unknown X virus mutates, almost the entire station crew is infected, you need to stop the army of mutants before they break through to Earth and doomsday began!

name: Its Fun to Break Things
description: It's Fun To Break Things is the best way to escape as you smash everything in your vicinity to pieces. Be a "bull in a china shop" and aim for the high score as you progress through the levels. Offered up in virtual reality this will really get you moving.

name: Your Future Self
description: Your Future Self is a thrilling time loop "conversation-em-up" with a unique conversational "battle" mechanic. It harks back to the aesthetics of text-based adventure games whilst deliberately subverting your expectations; both in story and design.

name: Path of Exile: Synthesis
description: In Path of Exile: Synthesis, players will meet Cavas and help him recover his lost memories by fighting their way through them and then stabilising them to collect a fragment of that memory.

name: Assault Android Cactus+
description:
Assault Android Cactus is an arcade style twin stick shooter set in a vivid sci fi universe. Junior Constable Cactus is outside her pay grade when she responds to a distress call and ends up stranded on a crippled space freighter under attack by its own robot workers. 
 
The Assault Android Cactus+ update comes with Campaign+, new costumes and a new aiming mode.

name: Push Pull
description: Push Pull is a challenging 2D puzzle game. You play as Push and Pull, and must work together through a series of simple looking, yet challenging puzzles in an unknown test facility. Will you persevere and discover what purpose this testing serves? Includes over 40 levels and multiple puzzle mechanics.

name: Polygon's Royale
description: Polygon's Royal is the battleground survival game for everyone! It is a single player last man standing third/first person shooter for low spec pc’s with adjustable graphic settings for higher spec pc’s.

name: Trash Time
description: Trash Time is a virtual reality game that can teach you how to recycle in a fun way. Burnt trash accumulates CO2 gas, that is one of the leading causes of global warming. Try to save the Earth by playing as a alien robot with flexible hands, recycle trash using powerups and power tools.

name: Ruination
description: Navigate a hostile alien world full of monstrous creatures! Battle mighty bosses! Wield a vast array of brutal weaponry! Fight your way to the core of the planet and complete your mission... or die.

name: The Love Boat - Second Chances
description: Get ready for a new time management adventure with the Love Boat crew!

name: Leanna's Slice of Life
description: In a world where demons exist, Kain and Leanna live in a relatively peaceful village. The two eventually get married. However, due to the incessant demon attacks, Kain becomes careless and falls into a lot of debt. It'll be up to Leanna to help pay off Kain's debts in this Slice of Life RPG!

name: Fused
description: NF-01, A Nanobyte who refers himself as Nigel, is spawned after a cascade failure within the Skystar System. His duty is to navigate through the system levels to fix the fuses, avoid the damaged shock traps and bring the system back online.

name: Devil May Cry 5: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition of the 2019 game Devil May Cry 5 comes in collectible outer box representing a in-game toolbox and includes:

.- Devil May Cry 5: Deluxe Edition.
.- Replica Motor-home Model.
.- Devil May Cry 5 Art Book.
.- Sticker.
.- Premium enamel pin.
.- Cloth poster.

name: Devil May Cry 5: Deluxe Edition
description: The ultimate Devil Hunter is back in style, in the game action fans have been waiting for. The Deluxe Edition includes the full game plus additional content.

name: Evil Maze 2
description: This is a retro random strategy ARPG. Rich hidden elements, random props, random magic, random maze It's a different experience for everyone to play games.

name: Desktop Dynasties
description: Desktop Dynasties: Pro Football is an 8-on-8 version of American Football where players must play on both offense and defense. Build your franchise over multiple seasons with full career play. Call the plays and coach your team to the championship.

name: Devil May Cry 5: Ultra Limited Edition
description: Devil May Cry 5 Ultra Limited Edition is only available in Capcom Japan and includes a replica coat from one of the three playable characters: Dante, Nero and V.

name: Void Mine
description: A mining space station doesn't respond to communications. An investigator tries to find out what happened to the crew. Void Mine is a zero-gravity narrative action adventure full of danger and mystery.

name: Kirby's Extra Epic Yarn
description: The hit Wii game Kirby’s Epic Yarn is warping to Nintendo 3DS. Every stage in the original Wii version is stitched in, but this Nintendo 3DS version has some new features, like the ability to craft bigger yarn balls, summon bead-collecting wind and play two new modes featuring familiar faces King Dedede and Meta Knight.

name: Devil May Cry 5
description: Devil May Cry 5 is a brand-new entry in the legendary over-the-top action series Devil May Cry. The game features three playable characters, each with a radically different stylish combat play style as they take on the city overrun with demons. Developed with Capcom’s in-house proprietary RE engine, the series continues to achieve new heights in fidelity with graphics that utilize photorealistic character designs and stunning lighting and environmental effects.

name: Monument Builders Rushmore
description: This is the latest in the game franchise 'Monument Builders' which is a time management game about managing resources to build the Mount Rushmore monument.

name: Quest Hunter
description: Quest Hunter is a story-driven RPG with treasure hunt, puzzles and humor! Mysterious world, fascinating plot, unimaginable puzzles and insidious enemies are waiting for you!

name: Shotgun Farmers
description: Shotgun Farmers is the multiplayer shooter where missed shots grow new guns! Fire your bullets into the ground to plant your ammo. The longer it grows the more ammo you will get!

name: Noisz: Hyun Level Pack
description:
All-new stages featuring music by HyuN:
Inferno Force / Hyun ft. Kabotya
Fallen Angel / HyuN ft. JeeE
Girl Embracing the Dark for Light 2 / HyuN (coming soon in free update)

Owning at least one Artist Pack unlocks Mega Style for use, giving you a new way to play older content as well by using its unique charging ability!

name: Somnus: Nonogram
description:
This story is about a dream we all once had during our childhood.
In the quiet of night when everyone else is asleep, take a fantastic journey through dream land.
This story is about a dream we all once had during our childhood.
Discover the stories that await you at the end of the dream.
We'll be waiting for you inside the dream of Nonogram.

name: CosPuzzle
description: CosPuzzle is a game for cosplay lovers, you can play a nice game and be rewarded with photos of a cosplayer with different clothes.

name: MP1: Kopitcha Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Quakeguy Goes to White Castle
description: 15 speedjam SP levels, five custom skyboxes, a music track, and some map sources.

name: Fairy in a Jar
description:
Fairy in a Jar is a short but enchanting fairytale. It tells the story of a fairy who lost their memory and was kept in a jar by a human.

The fairy awakens in the glass enclosure with no memories. From the moment they open their eyes, the little fairy sees nothing but white lights. They meet Mr. Giant, who is scary but also a bit clumsy...

In a completely unknown world, with limited living space and a captor who speaks a different language... What should the fairy choose? To escape this prison, or...?

name: Stellar Interface: Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy everything that Stellar Interface has to offer!

name: Caveblazers: Together
description: Caveblazers Together is an online multiplayer mod for Caveblazers - team up with up to 3 friends on your adventures!

name: Con-Quest
description: Fight the cursed costumes off of the captured cosplayers! The annual Cosplay-Con has been attacked by an evil witch and you've been dispatched with your partner, Faye, to handle it!

name: King of Crabs
description: Battle Royale with crabs, and no shrinking arena! Intense massive multiplayer fun, battle with up to 100 real players per game! Scrap, scavenge and slaughter your way to becoming the King of Crabs!

name: Arcade Archives: Ikari Warriors
description: Ikari Warriors is an action shooting game released by SNK in 1986. Play as Colonel Ralf and Lieutenant Clark to infiltrate enemy territory and take down an evil organization from the inside. There's just one problem, your enemies are endless... but ammunition is limited! Pick up any ammo your enemies drop to replenish your stock, and use power up items to your advantage as you advance behind enemy lines!

name: Spellsword Cards: Demontide
description: A unique solo quest card combat adventure with 500+ cards, drafting, roguelike and puzzle modes of play. The campaign features a unique MULTI-CLASSING SYSTEM and 50 boss fights plus hundreds of encounters.

name: Space Smash
description: Inspired by classic Arcade games, Space Smash is a fast, addictive and retro shoot 'em up!

name: It's Winter
description: Panel houses, snow, overcast sky, tiny kitchen, shabby staircase… It's Winter is an indie game which genre could be classified as sandbox, post-soviet, sad 3d, russian sadness. Nothing awaits you: there is no chance to get out, no room for adventures and breathtaking plot.

name: Gladiator: Blades of Fury
description: Gladiator: Blades of Fury is a melee combat action fighting game set during the medieval period. Players can play as a gladiator from four different clans, namely the Barbarians, the Assassins, the Knights, and the Dwarves. All heroes are unique and have their own weapons, skills, and fighting styles.

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Scorcher
description: Scorcher is a new blazing-fast infinite canyon racing game.

name: cockroach Planet Survival
description: cockroach planet Survival is a Single-player, survival game. Players need to find food and find out how to escape while protecting themselves against enemies and escape.

name: Hyperfight
description: Hyperfight is a fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts. Featuring new characters and modes for maximized battle!

name: Rest in Pieces
description: Please save all the poor souls that have been trapped in the dream demons porcelain nightmares.

name: Audica
description: Audica is a VR Rhythm Shooter from Harmonix, the makers of Rock Band and Dance Central. Armed with a pair of rhythm blasters, you shoot and smash targets to the beat of a soundtrack that features songs from some of the world’s most popular artists. The better your timing and accuracy, the better your score. The better your score, the higher your place on Audica’s Leaderboards.

name: Need for Spirit: Drink & Drive Simulator - Off-Road Edition
description: Transporting contraband (the good ol’ booze and cigs) across difficult terrain, has never looked or felt more captivating. Forget about rusty pickup trucks and jeeps. What better way to deter the border patrol than transporting your high-risk wares with a freaking tank?

name: Glad Valakas Tower Defence 2
description: 2028. Due to the global economic crisis, Valera’s grandfather’s garage is attacked by many enemies who are trying to capture the hero’s golden bucket. Help Valera to repel the attacks of enemies and defend the most valuable thing for him.

name: Sordwin: The Evertree Saga
description: Set sail for adventure and mystery on the island of Sordwin. Explore the town in secret or in style, meet and mingle with the island's residents, wield weapons and magic and uncover clues before darkness falls!

name: Galaxy Trucker: Extended Edition
description: Sign up to be a galaxy trucker today! An adaptation of Vlaada Chvátil’s award-winning board game is now on Steam. Already includes the expansion ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES!

name: Zyphoid
description: Look though the eyes and visor of bounty hunter Dugon as you follow him on his quest to exterminate the alien parasites called zyphoids and discover the truth about Planet Zyphamin its lost civilization and the horrors that lurk below the surface in the dark, waiting to come out.

name: Matanga
description: Not all friends returned after a night forest disco? The local aborigine - Matanga, is always glad to new guests in his lair! Do you want to test your ability to survive in a fight with a local maniac, unraveling his monstrous secret? Fear!

name: Hellink
description: The first visual novel about fake news! Investigate in 2044 in a humorous and cyberpunk universe. Counter your opponents' lies and thwart the plot that threatens Néo-Sorbonne!

name: A meadow Piece
description: This is a meadow simulator with slightly different flowers. Either just watch the flowers grow. Or defend yourself against strange aliens. Actively intervene in the development of the meadow. Play with your friends, either as a team or against each other.

name: I hate this game
description: I hate this game is a logic game, where gameplay changes every level. Solve crazy puzzles and use forgotten functions of your PC! Be attentive, interact with everything that you see on the screen.

name: Flowers: Les Quatre Saisons
description: A collection of four Flowers games in one package.

name: Xtreme League
description: Go snowboarding whenever you like, regardless of the weather outside the window! Learn new tracks, get points and renew your board! Xtreme League is waiting for you!

name: Shadow Legend VR
description: Shadow Legend is an action-RPG exclusively designed for VR where you play as the Grand Master of the Knights Templar in a story-driven medieval crusade. Freely explore densely filled worlds and use your sword, bow, and magic skills to save your kingdom from the destruction of Lord Adaroth.

name: Brave Nine
description:
The Empire has fallen, and the Age of Great Mercenaries Now Begins!

Create Your Ultimate Team And Strike Down Your Enemies!

name: Frag
description: Frag is the perfect FPS experience for your phone or tablet!

name: Ethereal
description: Enter an abstract and mysterious world filled with carefully designed puzzles evoking an introspective state of mind...

name: 1 Screen Platformer
description:
You command a rag-tag team of interstellar bounty hunters as they race for elusive golden skull of an elder god. It is buried deep within the temple of the lava-worshiping cult known as the Guthra-dun. The self-defense systems pulsates and snaps to life as soon as Nadia, Vez, and Subject X95c step foot on the planet. 
Are you cunning enough to navigate this tough-as-hell platformer and reach the end? 
 
WHAT IS 1 SCREEN PLATFORMER? 
 
- A game where you can jump, run, and climb ladders. 
 
- A game where you jump over stuff and onto platforms. 
 
- A game where you have to get to the end as fast as you can. 
 
- A game where you die a lot. 
 
- A game with 3 playable characters. 
 
- A game with 90 achievements. 
 
- A game with about 1 hour of total game play (unless you want to keep retrying to get a better run time then it is infinite). 
 
Subject X95c 
The mysterious biological experiment named Subject X95c knows no fear. Her advanced adrenal glands make her adept and testing the temple's defense system for weak points. To win, she must clear 100% of the fog from the temple. Leave no stone un turned. 
 
Nadia Stormhammer 
As commander of the Geodesic Celestial Liberation Front antiquities wing, Nadia Stormhammer must get in and stay alive long enough to rescue the sacred skull of dura'thum. The faster you can get in and escape the better. Honor to those with the best times. 
 
Vez Rendoux 
The mission of chief reconnaissance officer Vez Rendoux is to survey the best path through the temple. Grab the holographic nav orbs without getting killed. One mis-step and Vez has to retrace his steps to the last checkpoint and recapture the nav orbs. Collect, survive.

name: Freecell Solitaire
description: Freecell Solitaire has faithfully recreated the world's most loved card game!

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two
description: You and your friend find yourselves trapped in two magical clockworlds where you have to solve puzzles to escape. Neither of you have the whole picture so the only way to get out is to communicate what you see to the other player. Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection.

name: Mind's Eye: Secrets of the Forgotten
description: Follow an enterprising journalist who smells murderous intent behind what everyone assumes was a suicide.

name: Joan Jade and the Gates of Xibalba
description: Take the role of Joan Jade, archeologist of the year and mother extraordinaire, in her quest to save her children!

name: ShellShock Live
description: ShellShock Live is a strategic online multiplayer artillery game currently in active development by kChamp Games.Fight Alongside your Friends (Or blow them up... we won't judge!) Take part in action-packed 8-Player team and free-for all battles. Tactical gameplay is essential to victory, while numerous distinct tanks, weapons, items, maps, and play styles make every match unique.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Anniversary Rave
description:
Version 2.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Umbral Rose (Rita) & Vermilion Knight: Eclipse (Himeko)
• New Story Chapter IX: Journey for Tomorrow
• New Animated Short: Final Lesson
• New Featured Event: Fairytale Rhapsody
• ...and more!

name: Nyasha
description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: Beehive Bedlam
description: An HD fan remake of Beehive Bedlam for mobile, web browser and Amazon Fire TV.

name: The EdCo Incident
description: A point-and-click style horror game made in Microsoft PowerPoint over the course of nearly 3 years.

name: Cat Jump
description:
Cat Jump is a simple, addictive arcade game that anyone can easily play.
One Button Triple Jump! Simple but not easy!
Take control of cute cats and jump higher and higher, avoiding obstacles.

name: Cantrip
description: Battle, build your deck and earn new cards in this roguelite where your hand is your health: if you get hit when you don't have any cards, it's game over. If you prevail, however, you get to draft new cards for your deck before moving on to the next fight.

name: BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Saga
description: BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Saga is a mod of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones which recreates the story and gameplay of BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Senki Hen, a Japan only Satellaview game which can't be played in its original state anymore.

name: Extreme Racing on Highway
description: Race through highway traffic in this new endless racing game where you need to push the acceleration and test your car limits and receive money for your rewards and spend them on upgrades & new cars!

name: Cube Human
description: Cube Human is a cooperative adventure game，the city is the main stage of the cube Human.

name: Gungrave VR U.N
description: Become the legendary undead gunman Beyond the Grave in this standalone sequel to Gungrave VR featuring new levels, enemies, and play styles. Master Grave's punishing arsenal of attacks and abilities to mow down waves of mutant bad guys.

name: Bookend
description: Harness your child-like imagination to interact with the pop-up book, “The Little Witch”. Explore the book's world and help the protagonist, the little witch, Abigail, as she's pursued by an angry mob trying to stop her mission that could either mean saving the world—or ending it.

name: Luxor Solitaire
description: The Gods have summoned you to the banks of the Nile. Solve Solitaire-Levels and use your skills to build the great city of Luxor.

name: Elevator...to the Moon!: Turbo Champion's Edition
description: The cult hit VR Old-School-Point-and-Click-Narrative-Puzzle-Escape-Room Style Sci-Fi Adventure, lovingly remixed for Nintendo Switch!

name: Unroaded
description: Unroaded is a short visual novel about the living dead man who instead of inaction has chosen the road.
the world's first digital elimination play!

name: Candy Mandy
description: Classic game in the popular "three in a row" genre.

name: Jungle Z
description: [Game Introduction][ Jungle Z ] On a ordinary weekend afternoon, people were enjoying a leisurely holiday. Suddenly, zombies came out from nowhere and attacking. Everyone is screaming and running, nobody knows what's going on until dead.

name: Ecchi Girls
description: Welcome to the incredible world of Ecchi Girls. Immersed in the game, you can find your new wife and forget about all the external problems.

name: Border Control
description: Defend America from murderous zombie hordes, waves of unwashed orcs, and the military stength of enemy nations all bent on the destruction of the homeland.

name: Puttin' Around
description: Puttin' Around is a unique spin on golf where you are the ball rolling through custom game modes and maps online with up to ten players online.

name: RelayCars
description: Welcome to RelayCars: The New Way to Experience Cars Step inside the Showroom to view product accurate vehicle models in full, real-time, room-scale, 6-DoF freedom as part of your research and shopping experience.

name: Bassline Sinker
description: Bassline Sinker is a Shooter / Bullet hell that responds to your music. Add in your favourite .mp3 or .wav files and take to the high Cs, battling through the waves of creatures also using the power of music. Unlock and equip more weapons and enter the reef again!

name: My Car
description: Choose from one of two different car models! Customize it in your own way, then try it on the track!

name: Giftscop
description: Giftscop is a fan-made recreation of the fictional game Petscop from the web series of the same name.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper PA-28-181 Archer III
description: The Archer III is flown all around the world and in addition to our UK research aircraft, G- CIFY, the product will feature liveries from the USA, Canada, France, Australia and Germany.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Burnt Horizon
description: Rainbow Six goes to the land Down Under for Operation Burnt Horizon. Protection specialists with the SASR Mobility Platoon, Gridlock and Mozzie are assigned protection detail for a high-value convoy across sunburnt country. An unscheduled pit stop at a lonely petrol station turns into a standoff when their convoy is unexpectedly pinned down. Discover the new Outback service station map, where the red desert brings plenty of heat. Find more details in the full Patch Notes below, as well as many gameplay fixes implemented this Season.

name: Destiny 2: Forsaken - Season of the Drifter
description: For this season of Destiny, the Drifter takes center stage with new rewards for every Guardian to add to their collections. For owners of the Annual Pass, he has new tricks up his sleeve for players of every fighting style and combat specialty.

name: Pirates Outlaws
description: Play cards, build your deck to get the best combos! In Pirates Outlaws pick a character with a pre-made deck. Explore and manage your expedition to get more gold and reputation. Manage your deck and ammo to defeat enemies strategy, in a turn per turn combat system.

name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: The Serpent's Heart
description:
Experience “The Serpent’s Heart” DLC and endure the mighty Slayer’s Gauntlet in an attempt to save the lives of loyal rebels. Lara must infiltrate an enemy fortress to stage a daring prison break, then engage in a battle against evil Kukulkan cultists. Lara must also complete the Slayer's Gauntlet and navigate roaring rapids in order to receive the power of the serpent god.

Those who complete the challenge tomb will be rewarded with the Divine Bounty skill, which causes fallen foes to yield more gold coins when looted. “The Serpent’s Heart” also features the Dragon Scales outfit, which reduces fire damage, prevents stumbling, and accelerates health regeneration. Finally, players will receive The Serpent Lash bow, which deals out extra fire damage.

As part of the update, tombs from the main campaign, “Judge’s Gaze,” “Underworld Gate,” “Howling Caves”, “Path of Battle,” “Temple of the Sun,” “San Cordoba,” “Ancient Aqueduct,” and “Thirsty Gods” are all now playable in Score Attack and Time Attack modes.

name: Mahjong Stories: Vampire Romance
description: For many years Edward suffered from insomnia and saw what others did not. One day he tried to escape all the nightmares but his evil destiny overtook him near the weird graveyard. Its unhappy souls suffered under the authority of the cruel ancient vampire, and their last hope was the Savior, brave and clever enough to solve all the mysteries and break the cursed seals. So Edward decided to stay and challenge Count Orlok…

name: Bard's Gold: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Bard's Gold is a challenging platformer that let's you explore eerie worlds in a quest for a Goblin that stole your gold.

name: Lovers ' Smiles 2
description: Casual puzzle where you need to help two lovers to meet each other. Use your fantasy and the physical laws, draw incredible designs to connect Mr. and Miss Smile!

name: Real Fishing VR
description: Real Fishing VR is a fishing game that travels around the world. You can easily catch over 100 kinds of fish with simple, rhythmic actions.

name: Shift Shaft
description: Take Shaft on his way to find his meaning of existence! Shift Shaft is an Indie Side-Scroller with a variety of gamemodes to play.

name: Grater
description: A 2D platformer full of riddles, collecting, shooting and frozen time.

name: Super Space Jump Man
description: Super Space Jump Man is a fun and challenging gravity based runner. Traverse from planet to planet while dodging spikes, lasers and collecting oxygen.

name: Chocolate makes you happy: Lunar New Year
description: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, fires, paper lanterns, dragons and explosions.

name: Nano Driller
description: A brisk, soothing action-puzzle game. At a playtime of 25-45 minutes, this game offers a condensed, yet polished and complete experience, and can be enjoyed fresh or replayed at any time of the day.

name: Save Thine Kingdom
description: A light-hearted journey of a King trying to save his Kingdom from the malevolent Doombringer.

name: Fold
description: Fold and expand blocks until only one of each color remains in this original puzzler.

name: 7th Sector
description: 7th Sector invites you to immerse into the mysterious world of cyberpunk and overcome a difficult path by solving various technical puzzles, facing dangers and collecting information about the world and the events happening in it.

name: Space Bound
description: Retro Strategy Arcade Shooter

name: R.B.I. Baseball 19
description: R.B.I. Baseball 19 takes the field with more additions and improvements than ever before! R.B.I. 19 delivers a genuine MLB experience with heightened authenticity and incredible depth including the ability to manage your MLB franchise across multiple seasons, hundreds of new animations, updated player models, every official 2019 uniform, more player gear, improved ball physics and environments!

name: Tamashii
description: An ancient entity seeking help, a Witch, an unnamed soul and a Twisted Temple. A dark tale about inner discoveries set in a distorted and perverted world.

name: DK Online
description: DK Online is a 3D fantasy themed MMORPG that main focus is on large scale PvP oriented combat. You will be tasked with defending the world as a Dragon Knight, a powerful hero, only surpassed by the gods themselves.

name: Here & Elsewhere
description: It is twenty thousand years in the future and our signals have been received, but it is too late for life on earth. The hyper dimensional crystals have arrived to a blasted wasteland.

name: Puzzle Out VR
description: A tangram-style puzzle game with increasing time pressure!

name: Left Alive: Mech Edition
description:
The limited Mech Edition bundle includes:

- The Day One Edition of the game which includes the full game, and the Day One ‘Survival Pack’ DLC.
- Volk Action Figure – specially designed by Takayuki Yanase, which features interchangeable accessories, weapons and hands.
- Hardback Art Collection – 80-page artbook.
- Exclusive Steelbook Case - featuring mech designs from creators Yoji Shinkawa and Takayuki Yanase.
- Collector’s Box

name: Caretaker
description: Caretaker is a first-person horror experience. You are hungry for truth and maybe this "caretaker" is hungry for something else. Enjoy a ride of psychotic wickedness, through a maze of a "criminally insane" mind.

name: Cat Burglar: A Tail of Purrsuit
description: Cat Burglar is a short, light-hearted, stealth, puzzle platformer with a pet charity awareness campaign. Help Kat find her way into the Dogo Corps base to discover Major Bulls' master plan.

name: Eternity: The Last Unicorn
description: A fully featured RPG with classic game mechanics and extensive lore based on Norse mythology. As all elven unicorns were taken away and cursed by witchcraft, the elves’ sole existence became endangered. Players will encounter mesmerizing locations and fantasy characters as Aurehen, a young pure Elf, who undertakes her quest to free the last surviving Unicorn that protects Elven immortality.

name: Aussie Sports VR
description: The Aussie Sports VR experience provides unprecedented access to Australian sport and elite athletes in support of the Australian Sports Diplomacy Strategy 2015-18.

name: The Occupation
description:
The game takes place in a single government building, in real time over four hours, the game advances without input from the player, but almost all in-game actions can affect the game's story.

The game is set in late 1987 within the same universe as White Paper Games' first title Ether One.

The game doesn't have a health bar or energy system, when the game needs to punish the player it does so by using up the player's time, for example if a player is caught doing something they shouldn't, they are taken to a security office and lose 15 minutes of game time, which shortens the time available to achieve the main aim of the game, obtaining knowledge.

name: Gorilla Smash City Attack Game
description:
Escape with your gorilla friends from the most dangerous jails of all times!

Are you ready to explore the grand city jail and execute your escaping plan with the help of your prison surviving tactics while playing Gorilla Escape City Jail Survival game! Some Police officer catches you and your friend from the jungle with the help of their gorilla catching strategy. Missions are simple but interesting gameplay and it’s your duty to save your mate, friends from a prison guard.

Gorilla prison break is specially designed for all jailbreak game lovers and gorilla RPG game fans. Use your surviving skills and break the prison cage. Beat the security guards and unlock your friends with the help of master key which you got from a security officer. Use security baton to face the police officer and move like a shadow in the grand city prison.

name: Lucha Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: Let Your Egg People Grow Into Large Trees
description: interactions are cyclical. destruction leads to growth. learn to balance.

name: CatWalk
description: Cat Walk is a cat fashion game. Wear the right clothes to themed parties and get insider info on what clothing styles each company likes. It's not all sunshine and rainbows, you've got to earn enough FishCoins to pay your debt at the end of each week.

name: Hyper Mum Ft Adult Gaming
description: Have you got the skills to overcome the problem that has plagued you all this time? It's time to find out! Play as yourself, complete the game and don't let your mum catch you!

name: Poochy's Mix-Up
description: Poochy's Mix-Up is a game on the Nintendo Kids Club website.

name: Normal Me and Abnormal Friends
description: Having zero special skills, with just average academic performance, not standing out, with no friends… such normal me finally has friends… who are… from different tribes!?

name: Silver Screen Story
description: Become the boss of film studios and lead them to world-wide fame, supervising production of blockbusters! Customize your studios with facilities such as a CG or sound studio, staff cafeteria or acting school. Having talented directors is key, but it's up to you to train them up, bring out their full potential, and offer them guidance when they get stuck. Hire actors, or have famous pop icons, dancers, or comedians star in your films. Have fun with tons of possibilities picking the genre, themes, and filming location for your movies! Produce smash hits to win fans all over the world and break all box office records! Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games!!

name: Alfonzo's Arctic Adventure
description: Bob has gone missing and it's up to you to find him. Over 90 levels to explore in this 8-bit action-puzzler! Originally developed and released for the NES, Alfonzo's Arctic Adventure is now available on Steam.

name: Outlaw Tales: Western Adventure Survival
description:
Welcome to Outlaw Tales. 
You are about to begin your journey as an outlaw. It is up to you to choose the type of life you want to live.

name: Brain Pump
description: Brain Pump is a puzzle game: you rotate the blocks to make horizontal or vertical rows, or 4 blocks in a square, to score. It trains your pattern-recognition while having fun, and lets you compete with other players in the highscores list. It's cute, simple and effective for all ages, and it has little bonus game on board to relax from the puzzling once in a while. Fun to play and pretty addictive.

name: Snail Detective
description: Welcome to the Sheridan Hotel Snail Detective. The owner of this hotel, Mr. Sheridan, was found dead last night. Who committed this foul deed? Is murder the only crime afoot? What does pasta sauce have to do with anything? It's up to you to solve the case!

name: Winter's Empty Mask - Visual novel
description: Ichirou recently moved back to Momiji, there he reunites with his childhood friend, Reika, but he also meets a strange girl who has a clear crush for him. With time new feelings are born and he will have to choose which girl he likes the most, but there could be unexpected consequences.

name: Portal Touch
description:
Portal Touch is a logical physics puzzle where you can create portals and use different mechanics to get the star cube to the finish. Sounds easy? Well, give it a try and you'll see. 
 
Try to complete individual levels as quickly as possible and with few as possible portals. Can your brain think logically enough to complete all the levels and earn all the stars? 
 
Features: 
 
◆ Realistic physics 
◆ Cubes 
◆ Portals 
◆ Mechanics that change the behavior of the environment 
◆ 20 levels with more to come 
 
Mechanics: 
 
◆ Red bases that change the behavior of mechanics and the environment 
◆ Projectiles that change the behavior of the environment 
◆ Energy balls 
◆ Object destroyers 
◆ Bouncy walls 
◆ Light bridges 
 
Soon to come: 
 
◆ Lasers 
◆ Excursion beams 
◆ Gravity alteration 
◆ and more 
 
Have fun and enjoy!
